com.ianywhere.ultralitejni12
Interface ReceiveDeployFile

public interface ReceiveDeployFile

Provides a mechanism to create an UltraLite database from a received data stream.

See Also:
DatabaseManager.createReceiveDeployFile(String,String,boolean), DatabaseManager#createDatabaseFromDeployFile(String,String,String)
